about_the_game:
Join Ser Chubs as they adventure through an exciting world full of slimes, skeletons, and... robots? The world of Ser Chubs is not as it seems on first glance. Fight enemies, solve puzzles, and most importantly have fun! A top down, action-adventure game with puzzle elements. Set in a world blurring the line between fantasy and sci-fi. Do you rush headlong to fight enemies, do you solve puzzles to make fights easier, or do you learn about the world to potentially avoid fights all together? Talk to NPCs, read discarded notes, or ignore everything in favor of action. The choices are yours, but so are the consequences!

Features include:
  • Top Down Melee Action!
  • Multiple Unique Enemies and Boss Encounters!
  • Secret Areas To Uncover!
  • Upgradeable Weapons and Health!
  • Dialogue Systems!
  • Reading! (If You're Into That)
  • Multiple (Mostly Optional) Puzzle Mechanics!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N4120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Ser Chub's Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i3 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join Ser Chubs as they adventure through an exciting world full of slimes, skeletons, and... robots? A fantasy, sci-fi action-adventure game the likes of which is rarely seen. The world of Ser Chubs is not as it seems on first glance. Fight enemies, solve puzzles, and most importantly have fun!
